text: Hey Folks. Is there a super secret repository of nice `Weave.jl` templates for pdfs and web pages? I have the defaults working, but wanted to see if there is any nice gallery or something to pull from. templates are always a personal choice, but it is always easier to work from some existing source. If anyone knows of a good source, please mention it. Thanks.
